text:
My name is Sabrina,
and I'm the founder

of Long Island Laboring
Against COVID-19, or Lilac.

I use my voice
to uplift my community.

Lilac has fundraised
a lot of money to donate many,
many life-saving PPEs,

or personal
protective equipment,
for the frontline heroes

who are battling COVID
every single day.

When it was announced that
PPEs were going to run out,

I knew that I had to
step up and do something.

Her heart is an the place
to want to help people,

and he voice is a powerful
tool for the good.

Sabrina: I use my voice
through music,
writing, poetry,

and also through
the small actions I do
to help my community.

No matter your age, ethnicity,
background, or gender,

it's your own duty to step up
and help your community.

Congratulations, everyone,
for this accomplishment.
( speaking Mandarin )
Use your voice.
